column1: '''''prestanneth''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "'affection' of vowels".<ref name=LR>{{LR
The word ''prestanneth'' is often used as a [[Neo-Elvish
column2: Neo-Sindarin]] linguistic term in discussions on the phenomenon [[Sindarin#Pluralization
column3: vowel-affection]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/sindarin.htm#nasal Nasal mutation]" at [[Ardalambion]] (accessed 13 July 2011)</ref><ref>{{HM
